contentfulSermon.title: Backstage Pass to Christmas: Week 4 - Learning From Joe

image.title: Backstage Pass to Christmas Sermon Series

fields.notesFormatted:
1. Do I choose my plan or God's plan for my life?
  2. God speaks more clearly today than he did then.
  3. Tomorrow's guidance starts with today's obedience.

Redefining Christmas

  1. Christmas is offered to all people.
  2. Christmas is a daily choice.
  3. Christmas is a call to surrender.
